reviewText: I'm slightly confused by this compilation: yes, Blink and most of the Matt Smith Angels episodes are present. Missing is The Time Of The Doctor which features significant interaction with the Angels (and also features Capaldi who is listed as a star but features nowhere on this DVD). Additionally, Time Of The Doctor would have tied The Weeping Angels segment (albeit loosely) to the bonus episodes featuring The Silence (who truly should have a set of their own). Set comes across as a bit of a cash grab given the popularity of the Angels and no new Doctor Who this year.
Somehow I missed some of these as I only remember the Weeping Angels from later episodes. Went back to see these; boy are they creepy. Will be sharing with my young nieces and nephews.
Another outstanding highlites of the Doctor past series.
Even better than I remembered! So glad that good-old reliable BBC issued this. Also great packaging!

this two disc set features two of the newest creatures to appear on doctor who the weeping angels and the silence. disc one has the four episodes that deal with the weeping angels. disc two has the two episodes that deal with the silence. disc to also has interviews with the people behind these creatures.
Love the Weeping Angles.  They are my favorite.

Really great collection.  We were concerned about where to start with DOCTOR WHO because of the vast amount of stuff.  This was it.  If you're new to this show, I'd start here.  If you love this, you'll be on the path to building your own Tardis.....if you don't love this, I doubt you'd like any of it.
